mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.type AS "type", a.name AS "name", a.facevalue AS "facevalue", a.orgid AS "orgid", a.startdate AS "startdate", a.enddate AS "enddate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_coupon( id, type, name, facevalue, orgid, startdate, enddate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{name}, #{facevalue}, #{orgid}, #{startdate}, #{enddate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_coupon SET type = #{type}, name = #{name}, facevalue = #{facevalue}, orgid = #{orgid}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate} WHERE id = #{id}
